resources.string: You can move the overlay button by dragging.\nNotice if Android 10+ System Gesture Navigation is enabled, the buttons on the edge may not respond.
Depending on the settings, capturing may stop because the video compression process can not keep up real time.
Showing overlay button on the screen.
Showing overlay button on the screen.
다른 앱 위에 표시를 허용해 주세요.\n\n세팅이 끝나면 다시 앱으로 돌아와 진행할 수 있습니다.
접근성 권한을 허용해 주세요.\n\n제한된 설정일 경우 앱 설정에서 Allow restricted settings를 선택하여 접근성 권한 허용이 가능합니다.

Please select save folder.

Note: To show all storage, please open menu on top-right corner, select "show storage", then open menu on top-left corner and select storage.

Also you can create new folder from menu on top-right corner.
Video capturing is unavailable because this device has no video codec.
Video capturing is unavailable because this app requires Android 8+ MediaMuxer API.
If enabled, the debug log is output to the folder %1$s
